pages.text: The Friendly Fire Flower causes damage you deal to yourself (e.g. hitting yourself with your own arrows) to be negated for free. Being set on fire will also grant fire resistance at the cost of durability, however this takes a second to activate (it won't save you from the inital burn). It also blocks Thorns damage, however takes durability damage when doing this as well. This item has low durability.

The Friendly Fire Flower supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Unbreaking & Mending$(): Vanilla effect$(br2)$(l)Fire Protection$(): Increases the duration of the Fire Resistance effect given$(br2)$(l)Silk Touch$(): Nullifies damage dealt to other players and tamed animals$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Attackers and attacked mobs are ignited for 100 seconds, and reduces the chance to lose durability, however causes constant fire damage
$(o)Any similarities to powerups from popular IPs are purely coincidental.
